title: Moonstone

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Channel the power of the moon onto an ally, protecting them with Basic defense. On Full Moon nights, you will instead embue your target with moonlight, protecting them with a Powerful heal.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - While you're alive, the factional Rock kill is empowered on Full Moon nights, becoming Powerful and Astral.

desc:
Post 737
*Strive for an eternal night, one which is given meaning by the impermanent moon.*
